name: Hart Missionary Baptist Church
description: Hart Missionary Baptist Church is a Southern Baptist church located in London, Kentucky, that provides both spiritual services and food assistance to the community. The church operates a 'Feed the Need' food distribution ministry that provides food boxes to families in need. The food distribution takes place in the Church Fellowship Hall (Lower Level) following the worship service. The church offers regular worship services, Bible study, and various ministry programs including Brotherhood, Media Ministries, Ministry Teams, Missions/Outreach, and more. The church serves the London area and surrounding communities in Laurel County.
source: Verified from official website and multiple online directories
hours: Food distribution follows worship service. Contact church for current worship service times.
eligibility: Must live in Laurel County, KY. Must bring current form of identification. One box per household.
notes: Mailing address: P.O. Box 696, London, KY 40743. Facebook: http://facebook.com/HartChurchKY. Food distribution requirements: Must be present to receive box, cannot be picked up early, do not have to attend worship service to receive food.
